text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 2019 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Gävle, Sweden, at Gavlehof Stadium Park on 11 and 13 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| align=left|Ignacio Fontes || align=left| ||3:50.38 |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| align=left|Piers Copeland || align=left| ||3:50.89 |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| align=left|Elzan Bibić || align=left| ||3:50.90 |} ==Results== ===Qualifying Rounds=== Thursday, July 11th 2019, 13:00 CET Qualification rule: First 4 (Q) and the next 4 fastest (q) qualified for the semifinals.Results from the official European Athletics U23 Championships Gävle 2019 website. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
